extensionsInfo.title: Solana token extensions
extensionsInfo.commonInfo: Token extensions are the next generation of the Solana Token standard. They introduce a new set of ways to extend the normal token functionality with additional features such as confidential transfers, permanent delegate, custom transfer logic, extended metadata, and much more.

permanentDelegate.title: Permanent delegate
permanentDelegate.permanentDelegateNotSetup: Current delegate authority is not set up.
permanentDelegate.description: Permanent delegate is an authority which has unlimited delegate privileges over any account for that mint. The delegate could burn or transfer any amount of tokens, at any time, on their own authority.

nonTransferable.title: Non-Transferrable Tokens
nonTransferable.description: Such tokens are "soul-bound" and cannot be moved or burned, except by the token issuer.

transferHook.title: Transfer hook
transferHook.transferHookNotSetup: Current transfer hook program is not set up.
transferHook.description: Transfer hook gives a token issuers an ability to dictate how users and tokens interact. Instead of a normal transfer, issuer can insert custom logic into a program to be used with the transfer hook extension.

transferFee.title: Transfer Fee
transferFee.description: Fees are charged on every transfer of a token and withheld on the recipient account, untouchable by the recipient.

interestBearing.title: Interest-Bearing Tokens

interestBearing.description: Tokens that constantly grow or decrease in value according on its interest rate. No new tokens are ever created, the feature is entirely cosmetic.

hardResetModal.desc: Reset Ledger Wallet to erase all settings and accounts on your computer. You can then choose your password and add your accounts back with your Ledger device. The private keys giving access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and are backed up by your recovery phrase.
hardResetModal.warning: Resetting Ledger Wallet will erase your swap transaction history for all your accounts.

softResetModal.title: Clear cache
softResetModal.desc: Clearing the cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are preserved. The private keys to access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

pinHelp.title: Secure your PIN
pinHelp.intro: During the setup process you choose a PIN.

rules.2: <0>Always</0> enter your PIN out of sight.
rules.3: You can change your PIN if needed.
rules.4: Three wrong PIN entries in a row will reset the device.
rules.5: <0>Never</0> use an easy PIN like 0000, 123456, or 55555555.
rules.6: <0>Never</0> share your PIN with someone else. Not even with Ledger.
rules.7: <0>Never</0> use a PIN you did not choose yourself.
rules.8: <0>Never</0> store your PIN on a computer or phone.

recoverySeed.title1: How does a recovery phrase work?
recoverySeed.paragraph1: Your recovery phrase works like a unique master key. Your Ledger device uses it to calculate private keys for every crypto asset you own.
recoverySeed.paragraph2: To restore access to your crypto, any wallet can calculate the same private keys from your recovery phrase.
recoverySeed.title2: What happens if I lose access to my Nano?
recoverySeed.paragraph3: Don't worry and follow these steps:
recoverySeed.paragraph4: To restore access to your crypto, any wallet can calculate the same private keys from your recovery phrase.

points.2: Select “Restore recovery phrase on a new device” in the Ledger app
points.3: Enter your recovery phrase on your new device to restore access to your crypto.

whereToHide.title: Where should I keep my recovery phrase?

points.1: <0>NEVER</0> enter it on a computer, smartphone or any other device. Don't take a picture of it.
points.3: <0>ALWAYS</0> store it in a secure place, out of sight.
points.4: Ledger will never ask for your recovery phrase.
points.5: If any person or application asks for it, assume it is a scam!

recoverySeedWarning.title: Please check the box contents
recoverySeedWarning.description: If your {{device}} came with a PIN or recovery phrase, it’s not safe to use and you should contact Ledger Support.
recoverySeedWarning.alert: Only use a recovery phrase that your device displayed when it was set up

beCareful.title: Please be careful
beCareful.descr: Make sure you follow the instructions on this app at every step of the process.

useLedgerSeeds.title: We recommend Ledger recovery phrases only
useLedgerSeeds.descr: Ledger cannot guarantee the security of external recovery phrases. We recommend setting up your Nano as a new device if your recovery phrase was not generated by a Ledger.

pinCode.title: PIN
pinCode.paragraph: Your PIN is the first layer of security. It physically secures access to your private key and your Nano. Your PIN must be 4 to 8 digits long.
pinCode.disclaimer: I understand that I must choose my PIN myself and keep it private.

help.descr: Don't know what you have to do? Get some help to close this step.

You are ready to safely manage your crypto.

Only one quick step left!

Don't worry, Ledger is here to guide you through your journey. You will soon feel extra comfortable about your crypto safety.

help.descr: Don't know what you have to do? Get some help to close this step.

setUp.title: Choose PIN
setUp.descr: Press the left or right button to change digits. Press both buttons to validate a digit. Select <0></0> to confirm your PIN. Select <1></1> to erase a digit.

confirm.title: Confirm PIN
confirm.descr: Enter your PIN again to confirm it.

modal.title: The OS on your Ledger Nano X needs to be updated
modal.subtitle: You can try updating the OS or contact Ledger support for assistance.

existingRecoveryPhrase.title: Enter your recovery phrase
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph1: Your recovery phrase is the secret list of words that you backed up when you first set up your Ledger device.
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph2: Ledger does not keep a copy of your recovery phrase.
existingRecoveryPhrase.disclaimer: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, I will not be able to access my crypto in case I lose access to my Nano.

warning.title: Do not use a recovery phrase that you have not generated yourself.
warning.desc: Your Ledger device's PIN and recovery phrase should be initialized by you and only you. If you have received a device with a pre-existing seed word or an already initialized PIN do not use the product and contact our customer support.

takeYourRecoverySheet.title: Take your recovery sheet
takeYourRecoverySheet.descr: Grab a blank Recovery sheet, included with your Nano. Please reach out to Ledger Support if the Recovery Sheet did not come blank.

writeDownWords.title: Write down 24 words
writeDownWords.descr:
Write Word #1 displayed on your Nano in position 1 of your Recovery sheet. Then press right on your Nano to display Word #2 and write it down in position 2.

Repeat the process for all words while carefully respecting the order and spelling. Press left on your Nano to check for any mistakes.

help.descr: Don't know what you have to do? Get some help to close this step.

newRecoveryPhrase.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
newRecoveryPhrase.paragraph1: Your Secret Recovery Phrase is a list of 24 words that backs up your private keys.
newRecoveryPhrase.paragraph2: Your Ledger Nano generates a unique Secret Recovery Phrase. Ledger does not know what it is.
newRecoveryPhrase.disclaimer: I understand that if someone gets my Secret Recovery Phrase, my assets become vulnerable.

help.descr: Don't know what you have to do? Get some help to close this step.

selectLength.title: Select recovery phrase length
selectLength.descr: Your recovery phrases can have 12, 18 or 24 words. You must enter all words to access your crypto.

enterWord.title: Enter Word #1...
enterWord.descr: Enter the first letters of Word #1 by selecting them with the right or left button. Press both buttons to validate each letter.

validateWord.title: Validate Word #1...
validateWord.descr: Choose Word #1 from the suggestions. Press both buttons to validate.

help.descr: Don't know what you have to do? Get some help to close this step.

reEnterWord.title: Confirm your recovery phrase
reEnterWord.descr: Scroll through the words until you find Word #1 by pressing the right button. Validate by pressing both buttons.

help.descr: Don't know what you have to do? Get some help to close this step.

success.title: All good!

hideRecoveryPhrase.title: Hide your recovery phrase
hideRecoveryPhrase.paragraph: Your recovery phrase is your last chance to access your crypto if you cannot use your Nano. You must keep it in a safe place.
hideRecoveryPhrase.keepItOffline: Enter these words on a Ledger device only, not on computers or smartphones.
hideRecoveryPhrase.neverShowToAnyone: Never share your 24 words with anyone, not even with Ledger.

quizz.heading: Quiz
quizz.title: Now game on!
quizz.descr: Answer 3 simple questions to avoid common misconceptions about your Ledger.

1.text: As a Ledger user, my crypto is stored:

success.title: Congrats!
success.text: Your crypto is always stored on the blockchain. Your Ledger only holds your private key, which gives you access to your crypto.

fail.title: Incorrect!
fail.text: Your crypto is always stored on the blockchain. Your Ledger only holds your private key, which gives you access to your crypto.

2.text: If someone else gets access to my Secret Recovery Phrase...

answers.1: No problem, as long as I still know what it is
answers.2: My assets become vulnerable and that person could have access to them

success.title: Congrats!
success.text:
Anyone who knows your recovery phrase can steal your crypto assets. 
If you lose it, you must quickly transfer your crypto to a secure place.

fail.title: Incorrect!
fail.text:
Anyone who knows your recovery phrase can steal your crypto assets. 
If you lose it, you must quickly transfer your crypto to a secure place.

3.text: When I connect my Ledger Nano to the Ledger Wallet app, my private key is...

success.title: Congrats!
success.text: Your private key always remains offline in your Ledger device. Even when connected to your Nano, the Ledger app cannot access your private key. You must physically authorize every transaction on your device.

fail.title: Incorrect!
fail.text: Your private key always remains offline in your Ledger device. Even when connected to your Nano, the Ledger app cannot access your private key. You must physically authorize every transaction on your device.

variantA.description: Sharing your Ledger Wallet data helps us understand your preferences and show content that's relevant to you.
variantA.whatWeTrack: With your consent, Ledger will be able to collect data about how you use Ledger Wallet (including page visits and clicks):

whatWeTrackList.1: To measure the performance of Ledger Wallet and enhance both the app and your experience (Analytics).
whatWeTrackList.2: To provide you with personalized recommendations and content tailored to your preferences, as well as to help us measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns (Personalization).

variantA.whatWeDoNotTrack: Ledger will never collect information regarding:

analyticsData.title: Analytics
analyticsData.description: To measure Ledger Wallet’s performance and improve both the app and your experience, we share usage data, including page visits and clicks.

personalizationData.title: Personalization
personalizationData.description: To receive personalized recommendations and content that match your preferences and to help us measure the performance of our marketing campaigns, we share app usage data, including clicks, page visits, and conversion data.

analytics.description: Sharing your Ledger Wallet analytics data helps us understand how people use Ledger Wallet, fix bugs, and offer an improved user experience.

details.1: Analytics data includes page visits, clicks.
details.2: We won’t collect or see any information regarding your balance, accounts, and portfolio.
details.3: Analytics are completely anonymous. We can’t see or collect your personal information.

personalRecommendations.title: Get a personalized experience
personalRecommendations.description: Sharing your Ledger Wallet personalization data lets us display content that matches your preferences

details.1: Personalization data includes conversion data, clicks, page visits.
details.2: We cannot track or collect any of your personal or portfolio information.

common.title: Help us improve and personalize your experience

common.learnMore: Learn more about how we handle your data
